alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jefferson; Inland Jefferson; Inland Wakulla; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 1:41PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Wakulla, southwestern Jefferson and southeastern Leon Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 141 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southeast of Florida A And M, or 8 miles north of Woodville, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Woodville, Tallahassee, Wakulla, Ralford Greenway, Apalachee Regional Park, Cody, Goose Pasture, Hells Half Acre, Chaires Crossroads, Capps, Lutterloh, Thomas City, Vereen, Capitola, Fallschase, Chaires, Southwood, Fanlew, Waukeenah and Wacissa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Jefferson; Inland Jefferson; Inland Wakulla; Leon
